extendedInfo.description: Now you can tell which way is up!  Perfect for deep sea cave diving, flying fighter jets, amusement parks or if you just have some sort of inner ear imbalance.The new graphics make it the perfect tool for astronauts.Sadly, it still does not work with the slider out.  The math department is working 25/8 to remedy this.

reviews.comment: Would be nice if cube was same size whether landscape or vertical so that is didn\'t pause during the switch.  How about just a pyramid instead?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only pointless if you have no need for this app. 5 *s for originality and does exactly what it says

reviews.comment: it doesn\'t point up if i turn my phone left (landscape) or upside down. Because of this it has ruined my life and I\'m going to kill myself to death...
